Since long before history, there have been Ruirui and Lucosa, two sides of the same coin.
The Ruirui are a secretive kind, holding hidden power both great and uncontrollable.
The Lucosa are a rough kind, using their magic to accomplish great things.
Both species see each other as monsters. War and tension are all either have known.
Some, however, choose a different path. Some live for the companionship of the other.
Some, even, possess the taboo skill of shapeshifting.
